Reviews.Title: awesome!!!!!
Reviews.Author: winnie
Reviews.Content: This phone is so awesome. At first I was afraid it wouldn't work but I have at&t; go phone and it works perfect!!!!!! I recomend this phone to people who love big phones. Its really awesome

Reviews.Title: at&t; sim user...
Reviews.Author: Mz.Teria(SSW) "Mz.Teria(SSW)"
Reviews.Content: This phone is excellent for the price, compaired to the cost of a Samsung note 3 ($700). The shipping is super fast!!! The reason i didn't give this phone 5 stars is because it does have a couple of down sides; it downloads apps, etc. Slowly most times, the camera quality is not that great ((especially the front camera;very poor quality)), and for some reason it wont let me view youtube videos ((to view videos i have to request desk top site and sometimes it still wont load after doing that)). But over all it is a pretty good phone for the $180 dollar price. And it does work everywhere unlike the at&t; samsung galaxy note i had (that was 4G)this 3G phone is pretty good, everyone thinks its a samsung....lol... little do they know! --p.s. not a dual sim phone...i have at&t; go phone (no contract) pop the sim card in and go!!!

Reviews.Title: So far so good.....
Reviews.Author: Nicky Holsey
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived from HK to USA in ten days which was well within the estimated delivery time. The phone was well packaged. Unfortunately within a couple of days it wouldn't charge, there was a problem with the charger port. I contacted the seller, they were very understanding, gave me suggestions as to how to correct the problem, in the end they arranged for a replacement to be sent to me, and after I sent the faulty phone back to them they reimbursed my postage costs to HK. I received the replacement within two weeks, so far it works as it should.I only have good things to say about the seller, their service was second-to-none and I would highly recommend buying from them (Masaistore). As regards the phone, it seems to be almost exactly the same as the Galaxy Note 3, which my friend has, there does not seem to be or many differences, but there must be considering the difference in price ($700 for the Galaxy compared to $160 for this one).The touch response is quick, it has excellent picture quality. I have downloaded all my apps without any problems. I put my Simple Mobile SIM card in and it worked straight away. I decided to buy the two-year warranty offered with the phone in case I have problems down the line (like the charger port again! hopefully that was just a one-off) but for now, I am very happy with my purchase and extremely happy with the seller.If I can get two years use out of this phone, I will be more than satisfied. By the way the Galaxy Note 3 cases fit this phone, which is great,  and gives me lots of options for when I get bored with the one I have. LOL!I will update this review in a couple of months.

Reviews.Title: unhappy consumer
Reviews.Author: Rosea Blackwell
Reviews.Content: I was very displeased with the merchandise. The phone did not work properly. I was very dissatisfied. To add insult to injury I had to pay postage to return it.

Reviews.Title: U9000 very good phone
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: Very amazing phone fits note 3 cases, I came from an iPhone and this phone is way better love it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Michael Flores
Reviews.Content: Got to me in 11 days and i'm in love with it. FYI this is not a note 3 so stop complaining about its lack of functionality! Great alternative no faults I highly recommend

Reviews.Title: great phone!
Reviews.Author: Al Garza
Reviews.Content: Just got one and it is really nice! It works will with Tmobile. Will get one for my wife as well!

Reviews.Title: Great Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Wallace "moncheretta"
Reviews.Content: Im ni stranger to these cellphones, have had the n7000 and love that phone a great deal very hardy as far as drops are concerned. but still works no matter what. But wanted to get the upgrade to the n9005 note 3 version, since i had to give up the other due to accident. It works perfectly as expected it pricey but im sure its worth every penny. just get the warranty that you can buy on amazon separately to protect against drops and fall, and water damage.

Reviews.Title: If I could give this 0 stars I would
Reviews.Author: HaleyMree
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend not ordering this cell phone. I was ecstatic to find a cheaper version of the Galaxy Note, but now I realize that cheaper isn't always better. After only a month, this phone is already going to crap. The home button randomly stopped working, the screen is very touchy and doesn't always respond correctly. The description states that it is a 13 mp camera, but it clearly isn't. I would hardly even classify it as 6 mp. Although the screen is nice for browsing, it is way to big to fit comfortably in your hand. So dissapointed that I just barely missed the time period for returns. DO NOT BUY  THIS KNOCK OFF VERSION, it is not worth saving a few hundred dollars.

Reviews.Title: love my new phone
Reviews.Author: mckinley hightower
Reviews.Content: everything worked just as they said it would and I love my phone unlock I can use it with any other company because of it being a unlock I love it used the internet and I can use it in any city I go to

Reviews.Title: I want what I bought
Reviews.Author: Misty Dodson
Reviews.Content: Although I like the phone I got, I purchased the Unlocked MTK6582 N9005 (which was advertised) but I received the Unlocked MTK6582 N9000. Amazon stepped in & did some adjusting to compensate but buyers check your product as soon as you get it to make sure it IS in fact what you ordered.

Reviews.Title: Oh boy
Reviews.Author: Gamer geek
Reviews.Content: Great phone few flaws but great it works on att network I like it might get a second one for work

Reviews.Title: Not what I was expecting
Reviews.Author: clarence williams
Reviews.Content: The phone came promptly like it said and the condition is brand new with two batteries, screen protector and flip case . However I have had issues with sound being very low on my headphones and reception from my phone carrier.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "wendy"
Reviews.Content: I just got my phone other than it taking almost a month to come I am very satisfied my carrier is strightalk I changed over my phone number a that same day i got it i love this phone will buy again

Reviews.Title: nice looking phone
Reviews.Author: Berni
Reviews.Content: The volume button broke on the 2nd day and I returned it didnt  really get to see how well the phone worked

Reviews.Title: Why my phone not working
Reviews.Author: Mahalia
Reviews.Content: I buy this phone have it two days n it Keep cutting off . Before it cut off I got about n hour to try to use it. Nothing was downloading on it . It went into factory mood n lines started to come over d screen n again it cut off and It keep sticking . Maybe I got a defective one but this phone is rubbish . The seller was contacted n all they cares about is me taking down my bad review . I can't spend $178 .00 n the phone cut off and not coming back on after having it three days.IF YOU BUYING thiS PHONE DONT BUY FROM USA TOTO .

Reviews.Title: nice generic for the samsung note!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth C.
Reviews.Content: Well I wasn't expecting this phone for another two-three weeks. It got to me in a little over a week!! First day with it so far and i like it. Only thing i dont like is the white cover it comes with- because white gets dirty fast.!

Reviews.Title: N9000 Note 3
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline J. Howard
Reviews.Content: Nice phone.  The specs are off though.  The description describes this phone as N9000, but inside the phones specifications, reveals it is a N9002.  I really like the phone, has a great retina display, and it really is nice to look at.  So far, I am waiting to get service, and will write another review on it then.  The seller said 6-9 business days from China, and it was here on the dot.  Very happy so far.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Phone
Reviews.Author: Jorge
Reviews.Content: Is Real 1:1 Note3Excellent working Wi-FiGreat SpeedNice , very Nice to write and to text.Nice to join

Reviews.Title: Great Phone Slow Delivery.
Reviews.Author: Danny B. Sylvester
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone not realizing how long it was going to take to get to me. I cancelled the order the next day. They refused saying they had already shipped it via DHL. They said 4-7 days. Wrong. It took less than advertised but still longer than I wished to wait, but, I had no choice. Phone is great if you can afford the wait. Comes with a nice case. It's a good buy for the money, Just a slow ride from China.

Reviews.Title: phone dont work
Reviews.Author: Charles R.
Reviews.Content: The phone did not meet anything the phone didn't work scrren cracked no stylus volume button not working. Still waiting on replacement waste of money

Reviews.Title: terriable
Reviews.Author: Juvarish Harmon
Reviews.Content: Terrible fake not good and doesn't get all apps not real note 3 and you guys don't want to fix it ether

Reviews.Title: great phone at a decent price
Reviews.Author: hurryinhoosier
Reviews.Content: I had been looking at the samsung note 3 for some time when i decided to look for an alternative due to the price of the 3. I found this phone, ordered it and have been using it since day one with no issues whatsoever. I would reccommend this phone to anyone who is looking for a large screen phone. Just remember that this is not a Samsung product, but is a capable phone for the average user. I must admit, when placed next to the real thing, this phone does play the part very well

Reviews.Title: its fake!
Reviews.Author: unhappy  customer
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone and its missing alot of the features that come with the note 3 and the s pen is plastic and doesnt work on the phone and the craziest thing is you cant charge the phone! it has this weird looking port where you charge your phone. dont get this phone you will be highly disappointed

ProductInfo.Features:
Unlocked world GSM phone. 3G - 850/2100, 2G -850/900/1800/1900. Compatible with at&t;, T-Mobile, Straight Talk, Simple Mobile and other GSM networks. Please make sure your SIM card is not locked with PUK code
3G - 850/2100 bands. Fully compatible with at&t; at 3.75G, compatilble with T-Mobile at 2G. For other network such as Straight Talk, Trac fone, Simple Mobile or Net 10 will require a manual APN setup
Free Tether - Use your 3G data service as a WiFi hot spot and connect your notebook, ipad or other device for free. No need to pay monthly tether fee
Dual SIM Card Dual Standby(one Micro SIM card and one standard SIM card)
Operation System Android 4.3 CPU	MTK6582 Cortex-A7 Quad Core 1.3GHz GPU: Mali-400MP
ProductInfo.Name: Unlocked 5.5 Inch 960x540 Screen With MTK6582 1.3GHz Quad Core CPU Android 4.3 Smart Phone 512MB RAM+GPS+S Pen air gesture-white
